name: SIMULATION (luhyphenwai)
description:
---- SYSTEM BOOT ---- INITIALIZING SIMULATION . . . . TEST YOUR SKILLS SURVIVE WASD to move  Shift to sprint  Crtl to crouch  Scroll wheel and numbers to switch weapons  Left Click to shoot  Right Click to aim

Enemies drop ammo and guns

Weapons: Knife, Pistol, SMG, Rifle, Sniper 

Made in around a week for 7DFPS 2021

First proper 3D game
